io.gumga.application.spring.config

Interface ApplicationConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configuration, PersistenceConfiguration

    public interface ApplicationConfiguration
extends Configuration, PersistenceConfiguration
    Default interface used to configure the spring over annotations. It supports common app configurations as well as database ones.
    Since:
    jul/2015
    Author:
    gyowanny

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.gumga.application.spring.config.Configuration

        gumgaPasswordService, javaMailSenderImpl, methodValidationPostProcessor, templateEngineService, validator

      • Methods inherited from interface io.gumga.application.spring.config.PersistenceConfiguration

        dataSource, entityManagerFactory, transactionManager
